verses.text: \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w gave|strong="H7761"\w* an order \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H7761"\w* \w search|strong="H1240"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H1240"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* records, \w where|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* things \w of|strong="H1005"\w* value \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w stored|strong="H5182"\w* up \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4076"\w* at Achmetha, \w in|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* great house \w of|strong="H4083"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* king \w in|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* land \w of|strong="H4083"\w* \w Media|strong="H4076"\w*, \w they|strong="H1768"\w* came across \w a|strong="H7912"\w* roll, \w in|strong="H1768"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* this statement \w was|strong="H4040"\w* put on record:

\w In|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w first|strong="H2298"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H7761"\w* an order: \w In|strong="H0426"\w* connection \w with|strong="H1124"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, let \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* put up, \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w place|strong="H0870"\w* \w where|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w make|strong="H7761"\w* offerings, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* let \w the|strong="H1768"\w* earth \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* bases \w be|strong="H0426"\w* put \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w place|strong="H0870"\w*; let it \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w sixty|strong="H8361"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0521"\w* high \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w sixty|strong="H8361"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0521"\w* \w wide|strong="H6613"\w*;

With \w three|strong="H8532"\w* lines \w of|strong="H1005"\w* great \w stones|strong="H0069"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* one line \w of|strong="H1005"\w* new \w wood|strong="H0636"\w* supports; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* let \w the|strong="H1768"\w* necessary money \w be|strong="H5313"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* out \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* king's store-house;

\w And|strong="H1722"\w* \w let|strong="H0638"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w took|strong="H5312"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w Temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w to|strong="H4481"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w be|strong="H0426"\w* given back \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w taken|strong="H5312"\w* again \w to|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w Temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, every one \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w its|strong="H4481"\w* \w place|strong="H0870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w put|strong="H5182"\w* them \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w*, \w Tattenai|strong="H8674"\w*, ruler \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* land across \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w and|strong="H8370"\w* \w Shethar-bozenai|strong="H8370"\w* \w and|strong="H8370"\w* your people \w the|strong="H5675"\w* Apharsachites across \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w keep|strong="H7352"\w* \w far|strong="H7352"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w place|strong="H1934"\w*:

Let \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w work|strong="H5673"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* go \w on|strong="H5922"\w*; let \w the|strong="H5922"\w* ruler \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* their responsible men put up \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* its \w place|strong="H0870"\w*.

Further, \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w give|strong="H3052"\w* \w orders|strong="H2942"\w* \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w what|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w do|strong="H5648"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* responsible \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* connection \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*: \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* king's wealth, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w*, \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w taxes|strong="H4061"\w* got together \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* land over \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w the|strong="H5675"\w* money needed \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* readily, \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* their work may \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w stopped|strong="H0989"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8065"\w* \w whatever|strong="H4101"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1934"\w* \w need|strong="H2818"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w*, \w young|strong="H1123"\w* oxen \w and|strong="H8065"\w* sheep \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w lambs|strong="H0563"\w*, \w for|strong="H1768"\w* burned offerings \w to|strong="H3390"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, grain, \w salt|strong="H4416"\w*, \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w oil|strong="H4887"\w*, \w whatever|strong="H4101"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* say \w is|strong="H1768"\w* necessary, \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H3390"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H3390"\w* them \w day|strong="H3118"\w* \w by|strong="H3549"\w* \w day|strong="H3118"\w* regularly:

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w may|strong="H2417"\w* make offerings \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w a|strong="H1934"\w* sweet smell \w to|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w with|strong="H0426"\w* prayers \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w life|strong="H2417"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w sons|strong="H1123"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0606"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* have given \w orders|strong="H2942"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* if \w anyone|strong="H0606"\w* makes \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w change|strong="H8133"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* word, \w one|strong="H1836"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* supports \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* be pulled \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* be lifted up \w and|strong="H0606"\w* fixed \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w*; \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* be \w made|strong="H5648"\w* waste \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w*;

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* may \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w has|strong="H0426"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* it \w a|strong="H7761"\w* resting-place \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H7972"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w send|strong="H7972"\w* destruction on \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5972"\w* \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* \w hands|strong="H3028"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* outstretched \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w make|strong="H5648"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w change|strong="H8133"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w or|strong="H0426"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w do|strong="H5648"\w* damage \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*. \w I|strong="H0576"\w*, \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*, \w have|strong="H0576"\w* given \w this|strong="H1791"\w* order, let it \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w done|strong="H5648"\w* \w with|strong="H0426"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w care|strong="H0629"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Tattenai|strong="H8674"\w*, \w the|strong="H5675"\w* ruler across \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w Shethar-bozenai|strong="H8370"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* their people, \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* order given by \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*, did \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* said \w with|strong="H5648"\w* \w all|strong="H0629"\w* \w care|strong="H0629"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* responsible men \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* went on \w with|strong="H1124"\w* their \w building|strong="H1124"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* did well, helped \w by|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* teaching \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5029"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w*. They went on \w building|strong="H1124"\w* till it \w was|strong="H4430"\w* complete, \w in|strong="H0426"\w* keeping \w with|strong="H1124"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* word \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w orders|strong="H2942"\w* given \w by|strong="H4481"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w*, \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6540"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* building \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* complete \w on|strong="H5705"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w third|strong="H8532"\w* \w day|strong="H3118"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w month|strong="H3393"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0144"\w*, \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w sixth|strong="H8353"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* rule \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w children|strong="H1123"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3879"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* those who had come back, kept \w the|strong="H5648"\w* feast \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* opening \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w with|strong="H0426"\w* \w joy|strong="H2305"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1005"\w* they gave as offerings \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* opening \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* a \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* oxen, two \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* sheep, \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w lambs|strong="H0563"\w*; \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* a sin-offering \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H6236"\w* he-goats, being \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w number|strong="H4510"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7625"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* come back \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w* \w on|strong="H6453"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fourteenth \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w joined|strong="H0914"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w after|strong="H0413"\w* separating themselves \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evil ways \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w become|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* servants \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w took|strong="H7725"\w* \w food|strong="H0398"\w* together,
